data.title: Blue Slate Semi Face Brick – Clay Brick
data.meta_description: Premier brick supplier in Midrand, with top-quality bricks, paving, sand, stone, cement, and building materials throughout Gauteng. Shop online now!
data.text:
Prices shown on the website is including VAT (excluding DELIVERY).

Delivery can take up to 5 – 7 working days. (Depending on the stock availability) (Saturday, Sunday and Public Holidays are not working days).

We advise you DO NOT ORGANISE BUILDERS on site before materials arrived, we do not take any responsibility of your loses / downtime due to delay of delivery.

Should you wish to RETURN the materials on arrival of delivery; 20% handling fees will be charged for transport cost.

Please ensure the materials you’ve ordered is up to your satisfactions. Actual bricks might have colour variation to the website pictures.

We advised you to visit our store to view the product or collect samples before placing order.

Once the order has been placed or dispatched we will not take responsibility for returning or cancel the order.

7% breakage policy on all stock bricks / cement bricks products.

Refund policy: NO CASH REFUND. Refund takes 7 – 14 working da( 10% cancellation fee will be charge to cover admin & bank charges).

When calling for quote please specify the site entrance space so we know what size of truck to use for delivery. should our driver unable to get access to the offloading point due to limited space, we will then offload the materials at the nearest destination points.

BANKING DETAIL:

CLAYVILLE BRICK

CAPITEC BANK

ACC NO: 1761460909

BRACH CODE: 470010
